title: Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism – Friend or foe of European industry? - La Fabrique de l’industrie
author: unknown
text: Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism – Friend or foe of European industry? In this working paper, La Fabrique examines the different scenarios of Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) foreseen by the European Commission and their possible consequences on manufacturing sectors.
excerpt: In this working paper, La Fabrique examines the different scenarios of Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) foreseen by the European Commission and their possible consequences on manufacturing sectors.
